title: Questor: what can Patient Capital trust shareholders expect now that Neil Woodford has resigned?
text:
Questor investment trust bargain: for three months the portfolio is to be managed by a company being wound up. We ask whether investors should be worried

We advised readers to sell Woodford Patient Capital Trust two weeks ago but in view of the dramatic turn of events at Neil Woodford’s fund management firm this week we will look at the trust again, especially as we suspect some investors may have remained loyal to the fund manager.

Woodford Investment Management is to close down as a business, following its removal as manager of the Equity Income fund and resignation from the Income Focus fund. On Tuesday it also served notice of its own intention to quit as manager of Patient Capital.
